content.text: Bring the german verbs into the correct tense.

matrix.key: gehen
sprechen

bitmark:
[.match-matrix]
[@id:287966]
[@additionalSolutions: word1 ]
[@additionalSolutions: word2 ]
[@additionalSolutions: word3 ]
[%][%match-matrix]
[!Bring the german verbs into the correct tense.]

===
[#Verb]
==
[#Future, 1st Person, Singular]
==
[#Past, 3rd Person, Plural]
===
gehen[@isCaseSensitive:false]
==
ich werde gehen[@example][!Instruction][@isCaseSensitive:true]
==
sie gingen[@example]
===
sprechen
==
ich werde sprechen
==
sie sprachen
===
